titles: The Quaker vindication against Francis Bugg's calumnies in his scandalous pamphlet stiled, Something in answer to the allegations of the Quakers (in their printed case presented to the House of Commons, December 1693) ... ; together with Francis Bugg's own vindication of the people called Quakers since he left them and turned to the Church of England.
author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
notes: Statement at end signed with the names of 32 people.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724? --  Something in answer to the allegations of the Quakers.
